attributes.action: PUBLISH THE QUEEN'S WORK MONTHLY AND HAVE HER GIVE ACCOUNTS FOR HER EXPENSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not mind giving money to the queen as long as we know what she is doing with it. Why not asking to have her expenses regularly published and checked. We have seen what the MPs have done over the years and we must make sure that nobody is above accountability

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
